metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2012-0152 -- kexec-tools security, bug fix, and enhancement update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[1.102pre-154.0.3] - mkdumprd.orig get packed, remove it.
[1.102pre-154.0.2] - fix mounting root fs on labeled disk (Maxim Uvarov) [orabug: 13709374]
[1.102pre-154.0.1] Merge following patches from mkinitrd: - mkinitrd-fix-san-boot.patch - mkinitrd-fix-shared-lib-library-path.patch - mkinitrd-5.1.19.6-libfirmware-subdir-include.patch - mkinitrd-fix-setquiet-for-non-verbose.patch - add-option-to-forceload-multipath.patch - Update kexec-kdump-howto.txt with Oracle references - Add mkdumprd load firmware support [orabug 10432768] - Updated makedumpfile to el6 version (Herbert van den Bergh) [orabug 10088607] - Merged UEK modification,Updated Source1 kdump.init Added --allow-missing for rebuilding kdump_initrd - Updated kexec-kdump-howto.txt with Oracle references
